entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
